Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • homework1.Account

  • public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an account.

      • login

        public void login(Account[] accounts)
        Logins to the system. Checks if the user has loginned before.
        Parameters:
        accounts - The accounts array to check if another user has logged in before.

      • logout

        public void logout()
        Logout from the system. Checks if the user has loginned before.

      • sharePost

        public void sharePost(Account[] accounts,
                      java.lang.String content)
        Shares a new post with the given content. Checks if the user has loginned before.
        Parameters:
        accounts - The registered accounts' array to check if another account with the same username has registered before.
        content - The content of the new post.

      • follow

        public void follow(Account[] accounts,
                   Account account)
        Follows the given account. Checks if the user has loginned before. Checks if user is trying to follow itself. Checks if the user is blocked. Checks if the user has followed the account before.
        Parameters:
        accounts - The registered accounts' array to check if there is such account registered to the system.
        account - The account that will be followed by this account.

      • likePost

        public void likePost(Account[] accounts,
                     int postId)
        Likes a post with the given post id. Check if the user has loginned before. Checks if the user is blocked. Check if the user has liked the post before.
        Parameters:
        accounts - The registered accounts' array to find the last interaction id.
        postId - The id of the post that will be liked.

      • makeComment

        public void makeComment(Account[] accounts,
                        int postId,
                        java.lang.String comment)
        Makes a new comment to the post whose id is given. Check if the user has loginned before. Checks if the user is blocked.
        Parameters:
        accounts - The registered accounts' array to find the last comment's id.
        postId - The post's id.
        comment - The comment that will be made to the post.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Account[] accounts,
                        Account receiverAccount,
                        java.lang.String content)
        Sends a message to the given account. Check if the user has loginned before. Checks if the user is following the receiver account. Checks if the user is blocked to find the last message's id.
        Parameters:
        accounts - The registered accounts' array.
        receiverAccount - The account of the receiver user.
        content - The message's content.

      • viewAccount

        public void viewAccount(Account account)
        Views the given account. Checks if the user has loginned before. Checks if the user is blocked.
        Parameters:
        account - The account that will be viewed.

      • viewPosts

        public void viewPosts(Account account)
        Views the given account's posts. Checks if the user has loginned before. Checks if the user is blocked.
        Parameters:
        account - The account whose posts will be viewed.

                             Account account)
        Views the interactions of the user whose account is given.

        account - The account whose interactions will be viewed.
